actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1152(a) of the Social Security Act to provide that any State with a Statewide Professional Standards Review Organization shall be established as one area for which a professional standards review organization may be designated, if such State requests.

summary.text: Provides under title XI (General Provisions) of the Social Security Act that any State with a statewide Professional Standards Review Organization shall be established as one area for which a Professional Standards Reveiw Organization may be designated, if such State requests.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1152(a) of the Social Security Act to provide that any State with a Statewide Professional Standards Review Organization shall be established as one area for which a professional standards review organization may be designated, if such State requests.
